pageContext.claim: “Our proposal prevents new immigrants from going on welfare for at least five years. So you don't come in and go on welfare.”
pageContext.analysis: In general, legal permanent residents already can't "come in immediately and start picking up welfare." The five-year ban that Trump suggests already exists, and new immigrants are not eligible for the major federal public assistance programs during those years. There are some exceptions, such as refugees and asylees, or people with military connections.
